snippet: ING Direct U.S.A.’s new storefront near Union Square serves coffee and offers free wireless Internet connections but the A.T.M.’s don’t take deposits, so please don’t call it a bank branch.
lead_paragraph: ING Direct U.S.A.’s new storefront near Union Square serves coffee and offers free wireless Internet connections but the A.T.M.’s don’t take deposits, so please don’t call it a bank branch.

headline.seo: ING Direct Calls Its New San Francisco Location a Cafe or an Office, but Not a Bank Branch
headline.main: It’s Part of a Bank, Really, but Don’t Expect to Make a Deposit
headline.print_headline: It’s Part of a Bank, Really, but Don’t Expect to Make a Deposit
